Subject: Seminario Geometría Noconmutativa : Martes 5/10 10hs

Hola, este martes a las 10:00hs tendremos el seminario virtual de Geometría Noconmutativa del Atlántico Sur (GeNoCAS).

En esta oportunidad va a hablar Guillermo Cortiñas (UBA)

Title:  Maps of graph C*-algebras that lift to Leavitt path algebras

Abstract:

Let � : C*(E)→ C*(F) be a unital *-homomorphism between purely infinite simple Cuntz-Krieger algebras of finite graphs. We prove that there exists a unital *-homomorphism ð���: L(E)→ L(F) between the corresponding Leavitt path-algebras such that � is homotopic to the map �^: C*(E)â�� C*(F) induced by completion. We show moreover that �^ is a homotopy equivalence in the C*-algebraic sense if and only if � is a homotopy equivalence in the algebraic, polynomial sense. We deduce, in particular, that any isomorphism between purely infinite simple Cuntz-Krieger algebras is homotopic to the completion of a unital algebraic homotopy equivalence.
